recipes.title: Grilled Salmon
recipes.description: Healthy and flavorful grilled salmon fillets seasoned with herbs.
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Rub salmon fillets with olive oil and season with salt and black pepper.
Place salmon fillets on the grill and cook for 4-5 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
Remove salmon from the grill and squeeze fresh lemon juice over the top.
Garnish with chopped fresh dill before serving.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.description: Quick and easy stir-fried vegetables with a savory sauce.
ingredients: Assorted vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, mushrooms, etc.)
instructions: Cut vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat vegetable oil in a large pan or wok over medium-high heat.
Add minced garlic and ginger to the pan and cook until fragrant.
Add vegetables to the pan and stir-fry until crisp-tender.
Pour in soy sauce and sesame oil, tossing to coat the vegetables evenly.
Serve the stir-fried vegetables over cooked rice if desired.

recipes.title: Chicken Caesar Salad
recipes.description: Classic salad featuring grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
instructions: Chop grilled chicken breast into bite-sized pieces.
Tear romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces and place in a large salad bowl.
Add croutons, grated Parmesan cheese, and chopped chicken to the bowl.
Drizzle Caesar dressing over the salad and toss to coat evenly.
Serve with lemon wedges on the side if desired.

recipes.title: Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: Traditional Italian pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves.
instructions: Preheat oven to 450°F (230°C).
Roll out pizza dough on a baking sheet or pizza stone.
Slice tomatoes and fresh mozzarella cheese thinly.
Arrange tomato slices and mozzarella cheese on the pizza dough.
Drizzle olive oil over the top and season with salt and black pepper.
Bake in the preheated oven for 12-15 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown.
Remove from oven and garnish with fresh basil leaves before serving.

recipes.title: Beef Tacos
recipes.description: Tasty tacos filled with seasoned ground beef, lettuce, cheese, salsa, and sour cream.
instructions: Brown ground beef in a skillet over medium heat.
Stir in taco seasoning and cook until meat is fully cooked and seasoned.
Warm taco shells in the oven according to package instructions.
Fill each taco shell with seasoned beef.
Top with shredded lettuce, cheese, salsa, sour cream, and any other desired toppings.
Serve immediately, garnished with sliced tomatoes and avocado if desired.

recipes.title: Vegetarian Chili
recipes.description: Hearty chili made with beans, vegetables, and flavorful spices.
instructions: In a large pot, sauté chopped onion, garlic, and bell peppers until softened.
Add diced tomatoes, kidney beans, black beans, and corn to the pot.
Pour in vegetable broth and stir to combine.
Season with chili powder, cumin, paprika, salt, and black pepper.
Simmer the chili over medium-low heat for 20-30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot, garnished with chopped fresh cilantro and a dollop of sour cream if desired.

recipes.title: Pasta Primavera
recipes.description: Light and colorful pasta dish with assorted spring vegetables and a creamy sauce.
ingredients: Assorted vegetables (zucchini, yellow squash, cherry tomatoes, bell peppers, etc.)
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions until al dente.
Meanwhile, heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add minced garlic to the skillet and cook until fragrant.
Add assorted vegetables to the skillet and sauté until tender-crisp.
Pour in heavy cream and simmer until slightly thickened.
Stir in cooked pasta and grated Parmesan cheese.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Garnish with fresh basil before serving.
